thread.title: BRIEF-Sigma Designs Sees Q1 2019 Net Revenue Of Between $6.5 Mln And $7.5 Mln​

title: BRIEF-Sigma Designs Sees Q1 2019 Net Revenue Of Between $6.5 Mln And $7.5 Mln​
text: March 19, 2018 / 9:53 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago BRIEF-Sigma Designs Sees Q1 2019 Net Revenue Of Between $6.5 Mln And $7.5 Mln​ Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Sigma Designs Inc: * SIGMA DESIGNS INC SEES ‍NET REVENUE FOR Q4 OF FISCAL 2018 WAS $26.5 MILLION​ * SIGMA DESIGNS INC SEES ‍NET REVENUE FOR FISCAL 2018 WAS $139.5 MILLION​ * SIGMA DESIGNS INC SEES Q1 2019 NET REVENUE OF BETWEEN $6.5 MILLION AND $7.5 MILLION​ * SIGMA DESIGNS INC SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN OF BETWEEN 44.0% AND 47.0%.​ * SIGMA DESIGNS INC SEES ‍GAAP OPERATING LOSS IN Q4 OF FISCAL 2018 WAS $42.7 MILLION​ * SIGMA DESIGNS INC SEES ‍NON-GAAP OPERATING LOSS IN Q4 OF FISCAL 2018 WAS $17.9 MILLION​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2GJD1Ee ) Further company coverage:
